-if the tutor’s response helps the student identify that they have a need and provides the student support on how to remedy, by dealing with the issue and promoting student advocacy, or the tutor assists the student in helping them talk with their teacher without providing an alternative solution or work around, score with a 1. It would make her more confident to talk to her teacher and do better in class.”
